website_summaries.verdict: Great visual result with full HD projection. Extremely high contrast ratios for deep blacks.
pros: Offers a 0.49 throw ratio, which works well for those trying to create a projection in a small area
At 16ns of lag time, this projector works especially well for gaming images
Includes a 3,000 lumens rating and a full 1080p HD  resolution video signal for excellent visuals
Contrast ratio of 28,000-to-1 for deep blacks
cons: Unit may run hot after a few hours of use

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Projector. It really enhances the details in video games! Not only that but I was amazed at how bright the image is. It can be seen clearly even in a well lit room. I made a full video review to show you guys the details and how darbee enhances the video! If you found this helpful please give it a thumbs up! Cheers
customer_reviews.author: MindSeedTV

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy, Not recommended: Good at first , lamp problems on eco mode.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: To the manufacturers reply, flicker is occuring only in ECO mode, its happening on stable white backgrounds like the amazon webpage... its not normal 15days: it ran good for first few days, now the lamp flickers, I will be returning this. I am using eco mode throughout, as per quick search around the Web, optoma wants you to ship it to them rather than sending you the replacement parts. Stick to Epson/benq, this is not ready for primetime Try googling for "optoma lamp flicker problems"
customer_reviews.author: PAtre

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after six months....
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after less than six months of use. Contacted customer service, they said that it was most likely the bulb burning out (despite the fact the bulb said it lasted 6,000 hours which would be on for 24 hours a day for 250 days). We only used this a limited amount as it was in our bonus room. Bought a new bulb and it didn’t fix the issue. Our only option now is to pay for shipping back to them and wait and see what they do. Very disappointed in this product, especially because the picture quality was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: Great picture but be careful of overheating
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. Picture was amazing. I got over 100in screen from 4ft away. Sound is ok...i used a portable speaker for better sound. Color contrast is very high quality. Not sure is it was just my unit but after about 2 hours use....it would start to release a burning smell. Not sure if this was normal but after a while family would complain of it causing headaches. I returned it within a month of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: johnny castillo

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Usable even in gentle ambient lighting. 3D is great, family was amazed (father-in-law couldn't stop talking about how awesome the IMAX Under the Sea 3D movie was). While a little louder fan-wise, with a decent AV receiver and speaker setup, you won't notice it. While on vacation, we used a 120" flexible screen ( hung from photo background stand, an Xbox One S as player, Visio 24" sound bar, and these DLP-Link glasses:  (look for my review, worked great). We game, watch TV, standard Blu-Ray, and 3D Blu-Ray. Price is good, throw is good, and picture is good. Blacks could be better but, for the price, a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Saucier

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISINGLY GOOD!!!
customer_reviews.text: HAVE JUST RECEIVED THE OPTOMA GT 1080DARBEE PROJECTOR. I WAS AMAZED HOW LARGE AND CLEAR THE IMAGE CAN GET. FROM 15' AWAY IT COVERED AN ENTIRE WALL. FROM ABOUT 3 FEET AWAY, THE SHORT THROW PROJECTION GAVE A VERY CLEAR ~ 90" DIAGONAL PICTURE. I AM WAIING FOR AN OUTDOOR SCREEN TO ARRIVE TO TEST IT BEFORE FOOTBALL SEASON STARTS. I HAVE HAD A NUMBER OF HDTVS AND IM PRETTY SURPRISED BY HOW LARGE AND CLEAR THE PICTURE IS. FOR TESTING PURPOSES, I USED AN APPLETV AS THE SOURCE. NO ISSUES!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Fixed focal length
customer_reviews.text: This projector seems to be just fine, and setup was easy but I was very disappointed to discover that the focal distance is fixed. There is no zoom. You must position the projector exactly, within a few inches of the correct distance. We ended up building a stand just to get the distance correct. Also brightness is not consistent across the screen; there are obvious hot spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Opie

customer_reviews.title: Be aware for projector distance setup...
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this projector has no ability to adjust the picture size based on the distance. To get it to fill your entire screen you have to actually physically place it the perfect distance from the screen. No easy feat if you are doing this with a ceiling mount. They should add a manual adjustment on the projector for this like their competitors so you can place the projector at a distance from the screen that is best for you and adjust the projector settings from there. Also based on the reviews I thought the picture quality would be amazing. It is just ok. A solid 1080 projector but not amazing by any means.
customer_reviews.author: JayZee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect projector
customer_reviews.text: Great seller, fast shipping, brilliant product, I recommended to buy it, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Hussain  M  Al-Yami

customer_reviews.title: Great at first....
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was blown away by this thing. Please see the image. That is directly against our beige wall. Absolutely amazing. However, after about 3 days, it began to flicker. Also, and very minor issue, the hdmi input cable cut out was not perfectly placed and caused my hdmi to scrape against the plastic. Both of these things are probably just with my unit but wanted to mention.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Sweet gaming projector.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching projectors. My goal was a bright projector great for gaming that was 4K and HDR. The newest GT1080 is awesome! On eco mode the fan is very quiet. It’s super bright and is amazing for gaming. I play Call of Duty on it. The out of box image settings aren’t great, but tweak it a little and it looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Tebow

customer_reviews.title: beautiful image for such a CLOSE UP projector
customer_reviews.text: SHORT throw - YES! beautiful image for such a CLOSE UP projector. 5' away from the screen gives you a big, bright image (with the lights on, and a real projector screen). Beware though, if your not using a projector screen, and plan on using this in a LIT ROOM, you'll quickly realize it's not bright enough. It's QUIET, and... it blows out some hot air, as you'd expect. We use it for events, shows, flea markets, to promote our products, and with a simple power-point presentation, it drew people better than any signage we've ever had. I'd venture to say it probably paid for itself on the first event, just boosting sales.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Go for epson 2150 better quality same price
customer_reviews.text: I currently own an epson 2150 projector and I think image quality and brightness is much better 2150 I also wanted to test out the Short throw which for my room set up didn’t work had to place the projector in the middle of the room on a table which took up quite a bit of room I was better off the my current set up Ceiling mount
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: *Do Not Buy!*
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst projector I have ever owned. The HDMI source continuously searches and the screen turns blue during both movies and when the kids play games in HDMI 2 (lesser quality). Forget about HDMI 1 which is 4k you can't go 5 seconds without it scanning for a source. Complete waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lapointe

customer_reviews.title: Picture great, lamp life not as long as expected
customer_reviews.text: Best picture of any projector in this price range I have owned (of 3). But the lamp life is seemingly the shortest as well. Will see how long this new bulb lasts and update then. After the bulb was changed, I noticed it start to flicker the brightness sometimes which is kind of annoying but it comes and goes. We play Rocket League on it and I don't notice any lag compared to playing on a PC gaming monitor. Another pro is that it was easy to adjust. I top-mounted 2 or 3 feet away from my screen and was able to use the controls to adjust the picture for a great fit (a good projector mount helps also).
customer_reviews.author: CBJB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I Know all there is to know about DLP tech. This right here is an excellent projector. Sits 4 ft away from the wall and casts a 120 image. Color saturation and black levels are really great. Sharpness is great and detailed even for a 1080p resolution. I would recommend a gray screen ( not ALR, just gray contrast screen) to accommodate black levels. Don't worry it's a 3000 lumen projector, the image will be fine on a lower gain screen.
customer_reviews.author: kal

customer_reviews.title: DUDE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research and watching reviews for about a month! Haha. I bought this! I was very surprised by the quality and how bright the picture is! Even during the day with a couple lights on it doesnt wash out on the white screen i bought and hung on my wall. I was concerned about the speakers but they work fine. I will be hooking it up to a decent sound system when i get a chance. Some people said the fan is loud. It seems quit to me. Honestly I didnt even notice it at all when watching a movie. I used to have a cheap $80 projector that broke and this one is 1000000 times better!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Loring

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! Photos do not do it justice!
customer_reviews.text: No picture can do this projector justice. The brightness is excellent, the picture quality is amazing and it was a easy to setup. It took me longer to mount the screen than the projector and somehow I still managed to screw that up. The internal image settings of this projector has zoom, shift and keystone which make setting it up a breeze. I have it slightly less than 4' from my screen and it is projecting a 100" image. It is bright enough to be seen in my living room with the lights on, however the image is obviously much better with the lights off. If you are looking for an amazing and affordable projector, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: IHicks

customer_reviews.title: Worth its value
customer_reviews.text: This projector exceeded my expectations. Ive owned a projectors over time. This by far has been my favorite. I uploaded a video of Darbee effect shown on Game Far Cry Primal. It does very well. We have it at 100 inches currently. We love it. And with the kinect its really fun to play on. The 3d is alot better than I expected as well. Thor ragnorak looked great. The sound is poor out of the projector speakers... but i never really expected much from it anyhow. Overall for cost - it is well worth it. It travels well. The carry case it comes with is ok. but i bought a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: The location of the Optoma GT1080 caused a tripping hazard
customer_reviews.text: The Optoma GT 1080HDR short throw sets up about 4 feet from the screen, pretty much in the middle of the room, with a 6 foot power cord and hdmi connected. The ceiling mount option would be safer, but more costly, requiring an electrical outlet installed, and snaking of the hdmi. The picture was very impressive for daytime viewing without closed blinds, for ball games, news and gameshows. The movies really need a darker room. There is no wifi and usb is only for power. I swapped it for the Optoma 5600 ultra short throw with a wifi dongle
customer_reviews.author: Cejay

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome projector!!!
customer_reviews.text: This projector has an unbelievable 0.49 throw ratio. So I can project a 10 foot image from just 5 feet away!! The picture is crisp, the video, fluid given its 16ms response time. The lamp is reasonably bright even for day time viewing (with the blinds closed). The vertical keystone is helpful. Only thing missing is a zoom but I keep it on a stand in the living room and just move the stand back/forward as needed :-) Very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: TrollHntr

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best option under 1000 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: The short throw is excellent for practical purposes. It's very easy to get a decent sized screen around the house. It downscales from 4K to 1080p but thats okay for now, since 4k projectors especially with short throw are limited and very expensive. The 4K input does improve video quality however, and the HDR is awesome to boot. Great lumens, throw distance, and picture quality make this an excellent projector. There are one caveat but at present shouldn't really matter all that much to most people: HDR will not work in 120hz Game mode. For me this is okay, as 60Hz is good enough for me in HDR, as most console titles max out at 60fps anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Zain Shariq

customer_reviews.title: Needs more options
customer_reviews.text: The setup is stupid, why only have one corner and one center piece adjust to move the picture, one corner? It should be all 4 corners, second add a sixth middle adjuster to make it go lower. It's a lack of options that has me frustrated especially for a short throw projecters you need more options for adjusting the screen,. Having a heck of time getting it to perfectly fit the screen. Other than that, picture is good and everything just lack of options makes it more difficult to set up
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Video flickering after 2 days of use.
customer_reviews.text: Loved how this machine felt and looked coming out of the box. All the specs checked out perfectly for what I wanted. I researched projectors for a few weeks and thought this would be the best bang for the buck. Unfortunately after just 2 days of use watching tv programs and a few movies the bulb/machine is causing flickering and pixelation on the screen. Don’t know even if it’s even worth keeping at this $800 price point.
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this projector but....*
customer_reviews.text: Has been serving well for a long time. *The Eco mode is unusable as it's causing the bulb to flicker and eventually projector shuts down. Really wanted to give it a higher rating but it's a major feature that sucks out the lamp life.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M Morikawa

customer_reviews.title: Bulb Blew It
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the throw ratio, brightness and the color but this was while it lasted. Now just about 9 months in with light use the bulb no longer works. For a projector this costly I would expect far more mileage. Will go back to LED projectors. No more lamp projectors for me.
customer_reviews.author: ShaneRa1n

customer_reviews.title: Great but missing the case
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It was advertised that it was supposed to come with a carrying case. However, there was no carrying case in either box. I contacted amazon and they got it figured out within a few minutes. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within the 11 months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this projector 11 months ago, and installed a 2 months later. Up until this point, it was working really well, great picture, brightness, etc. Not used very often as it was in the rec room, (maybe a few hours every 2 weeks or so for a movie/video games). Recently went to power it up, and nothing... The projector did not power up, no sounds were made, just a blinking blue light. Extremely disappointing, as I know I am nowhere near the lamp life threshold, and the projector shot within a year... Wished I reviewed some of the lower starred ratings before this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Moorman

customer_reviews.title: RETURNING: Completely unusable for 3D content
customer_reviews.text: Returning. Don't know if the 3D feature was tested but the projector works great for 2d viewing. As soon as you switch to 3d, all picture adjustments made during mount goes away. Also the picture blows up spilling outside the viewing area making 3D completely unusable. Zoom, a feature you may think to use to adjust the bad 3D picture is not available in 3D mode. If you're buying this for the 3D experience, don't. Optoma GT1080HDR Short Throw Gaming Projector is unusable for 3D
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: The projector looks amazing while playing games
customer_reviews.text: The projector looks amazing while playing games. I'm using it on drywall with metallic silver paint and the colors really pop. The fact that it's a short throw projector makes it really easy to set up and get 150"+ projection. One issue I've been having is that it's haveing a small flickering issue after a few hours of use. Its more noticeable when projecting white and light colors. Have to turn it off and wait for it to cooldown.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Best 4K capable projector for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this a great projector that supports 4K @ 60Hz. There is a color wave that runs across the screen but you have to really look for it. Overall the projector is definitely one to invest in because for the price it has really good specifications versus the higher priced projectors. Projector is very bright in a well lit room, and performs well with gaming!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Castañeda

customer_reviews.title: Bulb or lamp issues
customer_reviews.text: There is the terrible white/constantly changing color line right down the middle of the picture that is super distracting. I’ve reset all of the settings and made sure the split screen wasn’t on. When I turn it on initially after it’s been off for a while it’s clear and beautiful. Then like 30 seconds later and it appears and stays the whole time it’s on. Can this be fixed? I like everything else about this projector, but I kind of feel ripped off. I bought three months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Pro Projector
customer_reviews.text: I ordered to replace my older Optomo 1080. This is a great projector, bright and crisp pictures, easy to setup. For your peace of mind, get the extended warranty. The last project did not even last 3 years., motherboard failure. Great projector at a nominal price. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh Sivaraman

customer_reviews.title: Projector image looks GREAT! very bright and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Projector image looks GREAT! very bright and sharp. My only complain is that there is no optical adjustments to shift the image, and keystone is the only adjustment which is digital. This being a short throw projector made it very hard to mount as any minor adjustment needed was nearly impossible to achieve. Especially using the wall mounted projector mount that i used which made Vertical movements impossible. This projector would probably be best suited to use with a wall rather than trying to align it to a screen. The picture quality however is EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: A must get!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME, better then my smart tv! Ended up giving away my 60 inch smart tv. I use the projector every day for 8 plus hours for a few months now no issue. I'll never go back to tv's again. The colors have no issue I did however adjust the colors in my own settings and I gotta say " stunning " picture. I use for gaming, movies, streaming cable, pc. FPS gamers must get as well. It's my secret weapon on the digital Battlefield.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the rainbow effect for gaming
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector with the primary use case of gaming off of my highly capable pc. Even though it is true 120hz, it did not take my long to notice the very nauseating "rainbow effect" that I was completely unaware of with these projectors. I would shy away from cheaper DLPs and only opt for 3LCDs - which I know for a fact don't have this issue. It may not affect you like it affects me, and if you have a different use case it may work fine for you, just beware of this potential drawback. It was a dealbreaker for me as I found it difficult to use for more than 15 minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful

customer_reviews.title: Blew up
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for just over 1 month. My return window closed 4 days ago and it blew up today. It was smoking and everything. Probably the lamp. I am not sure. $800 for 1 month. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: AMW

customer_reviews.title: Lacking quality control, but a decent unit
customer_reviews.text: The projector works as expected and is a great projector at that, except that the lower left side of the projection will not focus properly. Once you start playing a movie or game it's not that noticeable, but higher quality control should be used in the pre-retail of this unit and would make for happier purchasers.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it, color and piture quality are nice just dont expect this to be just like your 4k TV. See the pictures for reference. Throws a really large picture really upclose the wall and with almost no noise. Works fine on a wall but would be best on a projector screen. I am using the PERLESMITH Projector Screen 100 Inch 16:9 also bought from Amazon in case you wanna know
customer_reviews.author: Kamal

customer_reviews.title: Works great for us
customer_reviews.text: This is great for our occasional movie nights or big game nights. It is bright enough and the picture quality is great. I feel like last year's model would have worked just as well for me. I bought this for HDR, but there is very little support for it. Other than that great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Subbu Deivanayagam

customer_reviews.title: More Fun Than An HDTV
customer_reviews.text: This is my first projector, so I can't compare it to anything else. However, I love the sheer size of the screen and quality of the picture. It's a lot of fun to watch movies on, and I use it all the time. As a result, I don't even use the HDTV in my living room anymore. My only complaint is the audio output. It's a simple analog output, that's all. I wish Optoma had used optical or Bluetooth as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great short throw projector with excellent quality and very clear image
customer_reviews.text: Great short throw projector with excellent quality and very clear image. Obviously it does not deliver an image as sharp as my TV does, but the difference is not that big. it's absolutely amazing to have a 100+ inch display from such a short distance, the biggest problem that I have encountered, which I've missed before purchasing the projector, is that I cannot zoom in or zoom out and I have to move the projector forward and backward according to the size of the image that I want to have. Not that big deal, but it is worth mentioning. Overall, great projector and I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bitton

customer_reviews.title: Had to send it back
customer_reviews.text: Nice projector but after s few minutes the fan noise became unbearable. Had to return it. This was a defective unit as I’m sure that noise was not normal.
customer_reviews.author: Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Received it today. I start it up and immediately get a message "Warning FAN LOCKED The projector will switch off automatically. Please contact a service center for repair". Hard to give a positive review for something that doesn't work. Happy to update my review when I get one that works but it sure is a hassle having to now ship the projector back to the retailer (US) when I'm based in Japan.
customer_reviews.author: Saki Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: In love with my projector, getting my theater room all fixed up. Kinda confusing setting it up but we figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased 3 others for less than $1000 in the past year and this is by far the best projector I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: Incredible picture on this projector. I have purchased 3 others for less than $1000 in the past year and this is by far the best projector I have purchased. I have utilized the projector from 8' up to 20' with no loss of quality. My favorite feature is the short throw ability of this projector with the numerous feature sets makes this the best buy for the money. I highly recommend purchasing this for your home theater, no matter the size.
customer_reviews.author: ABL

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy. Worth the money. Use this more than my 70" 4k HDTV.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Projector. I've had 3 projectors over the last 3 years with 3 different screens. This Optoma by far is the greatest. Awesome picture quality, fast bit rate for gaming. I would recommend getting a short throw screen as well. But it has far surpassed my expectations. Truly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: michael hirt

customer_reviews.title: Minor issues but overall good quality
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for several months now and I really enjoy having a 100" computer monitor. The main weakness is the chromatic aberration when your eyes move too fast. If you can get over that it's a great projector. Very bright on normal mode, but eco mode is disappointing because the bulb arcs and flickers. The fan can be loud but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Skyhawk

customer_reviews.title: OPTOMA TECHNOLOGY GT1080Darbee 1080p
customer_reviews.text: Terrific picture, I have it projecting onto a 120" screen I've been using it fairly regularly for over a year, with no issues. There's no blurriness and has great contrast particularly with blu-ray and xbox one. even my trusty old N64 looks pretty good through it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: If you're a gamer, this is the one
customer_reviews.text: Last I checked, this has the lowest input lag. Great picture quality, and I've had no issues with it after 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Brantichrist

customer_reviews.title: Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do a house mapping project and it's bright and great colors. As for home theater use, if you haven't used a short throw, it will take time to get used to but the picture is great.
customer_reviews.author: Intrigued In San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Get's so hot it seems dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: This projector gets significantly hot. It was after the the return window that we really came to the conclusion that the smell was not a "new" smell, and that the heat was so significant it makes the unit smell like burning plastic. The seller will not do something to remedy the issue. This is significant, given the price tag. Bummer deal.
customer_reviews.author: T S

customer_reviews.title: The Optoma GT1080Darbee 1080p 3000 Lumens 3D DLP is a purchase you won't regret.
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to spend about an hour to set up this projector. 1 or 2 inches is comparable to 1 to 2 feet with a non-short throw projectors. I have an 8 foot screen and the projector is about 3 ft. from the screen. The color is great and brightness too. Has 3D capability and 6500 lamp hours on eco-mode which is over 2 years in eco-mode. Although this is a gaming projector, it works fantastically on movies and TV. Prices vary a lot so look at at least 6 sites for price and shipping cost.
customer_reviews.author: Marcopolo

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck - Football looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, next day delivery. Plugged it in on dinning room table about 50" from knockdown textured wall. Watched DVR of Seahawks vs Viking preseason game. Looked great with just adjusting focus. Image was 107" diagonal. Very Happy Camper for 750 bucks. Was not sure if a short throw gaming projector would look good with football. I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Solid Projector, very bright, easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this projector for pretty much a year now. I project it on a huge wall, the width of my wall is pushing almost 20 feet, with the projector sitting about 5-6 feet away from the wall, on the ground. Painted my wall with Sherman Williams ProClassic Smooth Enamel Satin Finish, it made a huge difference. With any projector, there's always a fan running, so keep that in mind, but you honestly don't even hear it. Highly recommend this projector, I have it hooked up to my receiver that I play my consoles off of, as well as my PC. Response time is great, no noticeable lag.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Yeh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mid range projector at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for the price! I have my PS4 hooked up to it, and watch lots of movies, and play Assassin's Creed and Red Dead Redemption 2 on it. You can always go higher end and pay the premium, but this projector has definitely been worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Short Throw Projector
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this projector for home theater use and it is AMAZING! Great picture and incredibly easy set up. The only reason I gave it 4 out of 5 stars is because they included a rating on the sound quality. It is nice that it has an audio feature however, the audio produced is more for an office presentation setting and not for home theater use. Overall I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Still the best for gaming
customer_reviews.text: This is still the best 1080P projector for gaming. The added HDR support makes it a good upgrade over the standard model. Most people think 4K is the best thing in cinema, but it’s really the HDR color that makes it great. I’ve watched the same movie again but in HDR version and it’s really is amazing. The short throw makes it better against the normal throw version since it’s closer to the screen - less light loss on screen.
customer_reviews.author: Nghia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a major upgrade for me. I had another older optoma that still works great but I wanted to upgrade to 1080p and this short throw is the way to go. I highly recommend this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Beefmeister

customer_reviews.title: This thing looks beautiful, still blows me away seeing the HD 13 ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks beautiful, still blows me away seeing the HD 13 foot screen it produces. It is bright enough, low level lighting isn't too much of an issue. Speakers are terrible. So plan to find your own solution This is my first projector I've owned. But I haven't had any issues and I've loved it so far
customer_reviews.author: josh worden

customer_reviews.title: it's great! What you sacrifice in picture quality versus an ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started playing with it yesterday and so far, it's great! What you sacrifice in picture quality versus an LED TV, you get back in screen size... a lot of screen size. The unit is extremely small when compared to other higher end units so if I had to, it would be easy to transport. Also, when they say you can put it close, they meant it. Took me 15 minutes to set it up and get use to the controls so that's another bonus. More to come after I do some color correcting and play testing.
customer_reviews.author: Binh T. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing games projector with stunning image quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever home projector, but professionally I use many projector in my work. I can tell that I am really chocked by how amazing and stunning the picture quality I tried it with STB recivers, nvidia sheild, and Xbox all looks woundefful. Playing xbox games with this projector adds another fun . Overall I give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Hussein Abdelwahab

customer_reviews.title: Mostly as expected besides fan noise.
customer_reviews.text: Everything as expected, there is a high pitch noise fan that’s alittle annoying that was not expected even with reviews but otherwise as expected.
customer_reviews.author: blurry face man 35-40 years

customer_reviews.title: great picture quality, bright but not for competitive pvp fps
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. It's touted as a gamer friendly projector and I agree unless you're playing competitive pvp. For that its not good enough. Money well spent overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jconn

customer_reviews.title: I should have purchased a projector a long time ago.....
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking to install a projector for around a year and eventually took the decision to purchase this one after exhaustive research. I was in two minds whether to purchase the more expensive model with Darbee versus the older version. I'm glad I purchased this model as the image is just "WOW". I don't have a screen yet so am projecting onto a wall and yet the image is still amazing. I tried the system in Demo mode with the split screen showing Darbee/Non Darbee and you can tell the difference very clearly. Highly recommend you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: planet22

customer_reviews.title: Nice projector but...
customer_reviews.text: So pricey. Just couldn’t justify over cheaper options. Not as bright as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Commish190

customer_reviews.title: Nice gaming projector with good picture at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I got this projector for a great price. It seems like a good item; the hardware is not too large and the picture looks nice. It is much easier to throw this in the car and travel than a 65 inch tv! I haven't used it much yet, but the couple of xbox games that I played looked great on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Fallahia

customer_reviews.title: Not much bells and whistles on it (no smart tv features)
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the quality for the price. I needed a short throw because I have an inclined ceiling. Not much bells and whistles on it (no smart tv features), but the picture quality is amazing. The tiny speakers aren't very good, but that could be solved by connecting a sound bar. The picture is great in low light, and still usable with a little ambient light. This can't compare with a 4k projector, but handles 1080p sources just fine.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great projector!
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. Amazing picture. Fan noise not an issue for any listening to 3.1 or 5.1 at normal volumes. Only issue is you have to mount it exactly where you want it since there is no offset up or down. Keystone helps but you have to get it exactly right. The level of detail is amazing- painted my drywall with the behr 3 paint grey combo of 1/4 pint black, 1 full sample size of semi gloss dark pewter and 1/2 gallon of silver screen. Looks perfect and the contrast is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: It has been great for the family so far. Really good picture and the short throw makes the difference for our basement
customer_reviews.author: soupy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I have a ceiling fan between the couch and the wall and was able to mount this in front of the fan and still have a 108" screen. It's also quiet. My greatest concern over a projector was the fan noise, but I never hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Cooker

customer_reviews.title: Best projector I could’ve asked for!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing projector for the cost. I’m a gamer and the latency on this projector when in “enhanced gaming mode” is virtually unnoticeable. The picture is incredible and the brightness makes it useful even in daylight. Very easy setup as well. I don’t even use a screen, just a wall, and the quality is phenomenal. I spent weeks researching my options, landed here and don’t regret my purchase at all. Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: Dayton

customer_reviews.title: Great picture but leaks light
customer_reviews.text: The short throw distance was 4ft to create a 120" picture, which was too short for my room. The brightened and picture looked fantastic, but light from projector lens leaks outside of 120" picture....4 stars×
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Great HUGE image projected on my ORANGE wall!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got this projector... Great picture, can get huge with some blackout curtains. I use a Cambridge SoundWorks speaker with it for better audio. Great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mike O

customer_reviews.title: Image is Blurry.
customer_reviews.text: Did not get what expected. The focus doesn't seem to work. The image is Blurry over all.. Seems like a used/defected piece. Also, the lens cover was missing in the box. Just got it yesterday, most probably will return. Would have given 5 stars if the image was not so Blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great if your objective is a ginormous screen
customer_reviews.text: Great if your objective is a ginormous screen. The resolution is questionable tho in the gradients of some darker scenes and very bright ones. I went with the BenQ; slightly smaller picture, lower contrast ratio but sharper/ cleaner image.
customer_reviews.author: Nadmiral

customer_reviews.title: This is working great so far
customer_reviews.text: This is working great so far. Like others mentioned, no zoom stinks and the focus is super sensitive. The short throw is amazing as I didn’t have the room for a standard projection.
customer_reviews.author: John Nava

customer_reviews.title: A very awesome projector.
customer_reviews.text: This projector is pretty freaking awesome. I've never haf one before but so far this one is worth the money spent on it. It basically covers the whole wall just being like 3 or 4 feet away and honestly looks better than i imagined it would. I can even have the lights on while watching it. Though my inside lights aren't super bright. I use it for watching tv and playing video games and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT 1080P 3D Short Throw Projector
customer_reviews.text: After doing some research on short throw 1080p 3D projectors.....this looked like the perfect replacement as an upgrade to our GT1080 that we were previously using. The Darbee enhancement is great as you can definitely see the difference in texture and it makes the screen more defined when being projected over 150" ....would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a great projector for watching movies, gaming, etc.... Great for outdoor movie watching too ....
customer_reviews.author: superfairyprincess

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this is amazing except the loud fan noise.
customer_reviews.text: Projection is crystal clear, I use it for games / YouTube and it's mind blowing. Only downside is the fan noise. Why on earth is it so loud??? One star of for that but that's the only downside.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is beyond the definition of picture perfection and lowest price synergy. Better than expensive Sony and jvc top rate with most affordable price access. Bravo optoma forever!!!!!!!!!!! Khiem Pham rph
customer_reviews.author: Khiem d pham

customer_reviews.title: may work for you
customer_reviews.text: the short throw is great. picture is ok mine shut down for some type of bulb error on my second time using it so I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBandit

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money I spent!  Great product and great picture!!  And fans not loud
customer_reviews.text: Have used for almost 2 months and love it use it every day for gaming or just watching TV/ movies, picture is great I use at 100" havn't felt delay in my gaming like my old projecter. Don't use for portability ,got it mounted but would be great for it might just buy the other one that's not short throw and 4k so I can use this one for outside events or just BBQ, game nights
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: great result with even in well lit room on a plain wall. cant wait to try it on projection screen
customer_reviews.author: Nike12

customer_reviews.title: The King of 1080P DLP
customer_reviews.text: The latency, the color, the calibration and adjustment options, the short throw, noise levels. Nothing comes close to a GT1080Darbee in this segment of the market.
customer_reviews.author: What.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant about buying a projector. But this one was well worth the money. Viewable in my living room during the daylight hours, which was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Brownsville

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a week , lost one primary color, returned it
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a week , lost one primary color, returned it
customer_reviews.author: Musicological

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Picture and brightness are great! Note that this is a short throw projector and needs to be close to the wall - we have ours under the coffee table. Did a lot of research before purchasing and it did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Siavash Safarizadeh

customer_reviews.title: Lamp failure
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this projector for about 4 months and I’m already getting a lamp failure led status. No warning what so ever. It’s gone through moderate usage, nothing to crazy, and now I can’t even get the lamp to turn on. I’m extremely disappointed in the life span of the projector. I know it wasn’t the most expensive thing out there compared to others but 4 months is absolutely ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Good but.....
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is fine but, if you're going to mout the project there is absolutely no shift or zoom so everything regarding where you will setup the mount needs to be perfect and your calculations must be spot on.however, you can shift or zoom the image but that is more of comprise and not a soultion. So basically i had mounting problems but nothing else
customer_reviews.author: Hashim omar

customer_reviews.title: As described.  Great picture for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an Epsom with this projector for the gaming part and it works wonders compared to the Epson. I also like the short throw, and picture it produces.
customer_reviews.author: Dav1d Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good value but...
customer_reviews.text: One HDMI port died. But it is still under an extended warranty, so I am sending this for a warranty repair soon.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hiroi

customer_reviews.title: The clarity is amazing. This is the projector to get
customer_reviews.text: This DLP projector mirrors a movie experience. The screen size can be larger than life. The clarity is amazing. This is the projector to get. Darbee adds a level of realism that you normally cant get out of a 1080 projector. This is a fantastic product
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great short throw projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a short throw projector in the game room due to having ceiling fans obstructing the view of a normal projector. The GT1080Darbee fit the bill. The image quality and the price was just right and the “Darbee’ setting really does improve the picture. 4 stars due to early lamp failure (right outside the warranty). I’ll assume it was an anomaly given how many positive reviews there are. We’ve had this for over a year now and the replacement lamp is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cooks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality projector
customer_reviews.text: Great projector! Awesome quality graphics! Perfect for gaming or movies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. I would have gone for an ultra short throw laser if I could afford it, but I can't, so this is good.
customer_reviews.author: MiBo

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute great projector. I use it as a outdoor projector and it is brilliantly great. Despite my neighbors bright light, the quality is absolutely stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Rene A. Montero

customer_reviews.title: Fan noise loud
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, picture quality and sharpness is good. But the fan noise is distracting
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Get one!!
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked how good the picture looks out of the box; I haven't even modified the settings yet. I put this a just a few feet away and get a monster sized image!
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: I received this projector yesterday and it is really great. I did not expect such a large image that close to my wall, it is huge ! The main downsides of this projector are the noise and the heat, but I was expecting them and they are not unbearable. The noise fade in when watching a movie or playing games. The integrated speakers are a nice surprise I'm glad I chose this projector !
customer_reviews.author: xavier v.

product_meta.title: Optoma GT1080HDR Short Throw Gaming Projector | Enhanced Gaming Mode for 1080P 120Hz Gaming at 8.4ms | 4K UHD Support | Play HDR for 4K and 1080P | High 3800 lumens for Day & Night Gaming, White
product_meta.description: Style:3800 Lumens/2019 Model w/4K HDR InputElevate your gaming experience with the short throw, 1080P, 3, 800 lumens Optoma GT1080HDR. Enhanced gaming mode combined with a 120Hz refresh rate enable blur-free visuals with lightning-fast, 8. 4ms response time for a competitive gaming advantage. Keystone correction delivers flexible installation options. Powerful 10-Watt speaker fills a room with loud and crisp audio to further enhance media and presentations. Robust inputs include HDMI 2. 0 and VGA for connectivity to a wide range of devices. A 15, 000-hour lamp life enables many years of use with minimal maintenance.
feature_bullets: HDR COMPATIBLE: HDR10 technology (with 4K input) enable brighter whites and deeper black levels; a 6-segment color wheel (RYGCWB) produces accurate color with sRGB & REC. 709 color profile
Fast response time: enhanced gaming mode enables Lightning-fast response time of 8. 4ms with a 120Hz refresh rate
Short throw lens: experience a large 120" Image projected from 4 feet away, allowing placement closer to the screen – ideal for smaller spaces and easier installation
Bright, razor-sharp images: 3, 800 Lumens, 50, 000: 1 contrast ratio, and full HD 1080p (1920 x 1080) Enable a detailed, clear image
Long lamp life: Enjoy up to 15, 000 hours of lamp life enabling an average of 4 hours of viewing time every day 10+ years. Projection distance - 1. 3’ – 11. 3’
Flexible connectivity: connect to gaming consoles, media players and other HDMI devices such as Google Chromecast, Fire stick and Apple TV; inputs include dual HDMI (1. 4a 3D support)

Easy image set-up: vertical keystone correction +/- 40 degrees allows the GT1080HDR to be off-center without having to elevate it to project the image onto the screen, resulting in an easy, more flexible image set-up

Versatile PROJECTOR: The GT1080HDR including a 10-watt speaker is ideal in a variety of environments including family rooms, theater rooms and game rooms, as well as outdoor spaces such as backyards, camping, tailgating and more

Full 3D: The GT1080HDR displays True 3D content from almost any 3D source, including 3D Blu-ray Disc players, 3D broadcasting, and the latest-generation game consoles; support for 144Hz rapid-refresh Rate provides ultra-smooth flicker-free images; 3D glasses required

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars576 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
